doc:
Fannie Ward https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Fannie_Ward 0 Fannie Ward, a.k.a. Fanny Ward (February 22, 1872 – January 27, 1952) was an American actress of stage and screen, known for comedic roles as well as The Cheat, a sexually-charged 1915 silent film directed by Cecil B. DeMille.
Ward's curiously ageless appearance, however, is what drove her celebrity. An obituary described her as "an actress who never quite reached the top in her profession ... [and who] tirelessly devoted herself to appearing perpetually youthful, an act that made her famous". Fannie_Ward , a.k.a._Fanny_Ward ( February_22_,_1872 – January_27_,_1952 ) was an_American_actress of stage_and_screen , known for comedic_roles as_well_as The_Cheat , a_sexually-charged_1915_silent_film directed by Cecil_B._DeMille . Ward 's curiously_ageless appearance , however , is what drove her_celebrity . An_obituary described her as " an_actress who never quite_reached the_top in her_profession ... [ and who ] tirelessly_devoted herself to appearing perpetually_youthful , an_act that made her famous_" .
